title: Africa untamed
brief_description: Documentary examining life and customs in Equatorial Africa. The film follows a boat trip through pygmie country to a pygmie village and shows hunters at work spearing a leopard. The problems of tsi tsi fly and sleeping sickness in big game country are discussed and the behavioural traits of the wild life found in this area, such as giraffes, rhinos and hippos, are examined. Also shows a hunting party in action in elephant country.
